name: Deep in the Shadows
description:
Your in a land that you don't understand, it seems old... Ruins and old camps. You have to find civilization but you weren't the fist to try.  Many have tried before you, and they tend to change, No longer taking a humanoid figure they will hunt you and they will always catch you.

Join My Discord Server For the Latest News and More! https://discord.gg/cNexfmcyFw
